answers.answer: Hi are you watching your diet?  I am having the same problem and I know that I have been eating too much sugar and carbs.  I have to get it back under control.  Do you know what your A1C is? That would give you a good idea of how you are doing over all.  It is also possible, if you are watching your diet that you require more medication to help you.Good luck to you

question: How can I lower my blood sugar to a safe level of below 130.  Also, after taking my med. why does my count still remain high, what am I doing wrong.
title: Diabetes adult type 2
